{"id":612207277,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1641224741,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/612207277/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n        if (numRows == 1) return s;\n        \n        List<StringBuilder> rows = new ArrayList<>();\n        for (int i = 0; i < Math.min(numRows, s.length()); i++) {\n            rows.add(new StringBuilder());\n        }\n        \n        boolean goingDown = false;\n        int currRow = 0;\n        \n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            rows.get(currRow).append(c);\n            if (currRow == 0 || currRow == numRows - 1) goingDown = !goingDown;\n            currRow += goingDown ? 1 : -1;\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder ret = new StringBuilder();\n        for (StringBuilder row : rows) {\n            ret.append(row);\n        }\n        return ret.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
